name: SummerGame: Trying to sleep when its 30 degrees
name_original: SummerGame: Trying to sleep when its 30 degrees
description:
Merry Christmas!
It's midnight and you're tossing and turning in your bed because its still 30 degrees outside. Rush around the house trying to cool yourself down so you can get enough sleep for tomorrow.

Made for BarSK's Summer Christmas Game Jam.
